Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans is 13-22-0 against the spread this season.
Washington’s record against the spread is 13-19-0.
As a 3.5-point favorite or greater, the Pelicans have two wins ATS (2-2).
The Wizards have an ATS record of 13-19 as 3.5-point underdogs or greater.
The Pelicans have entered the game as favorites eight times this season and won three of those games.
The Wizards have come away with six wins in the 32 contests they have been listed as the underdogs in this season.
New Orleans has a record of 3-1 when it’s favored by -175 or more by bookmakers this season.
This season, Washington has come away with a win five times in 31 chances when named as an underdog of at least +145 or worse on the moneyline.
